title: Apple cake with a twist
ingredients: ['6 medium apples - peeled, cored and chopped', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '225g butter', '225g soft brown sugar', '4 large eggs', '225g self-raising flour', '65g desiccated coconut', '1 handful pecans and/or walnuts, chopped', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', "1 (45g) bar Cadbury'sÂ® caramel chocolate (for glaze)", '2 tablespoons double cream (for glaze)']
